name: 30 Pcs Brooch Pins, 4 Sizes Pack, Gold Boutonniere Pins Badge Pin Safety Pin for DIY Craft Badge Name Tag (Gold)
short_description: These pin backs locking mechanisms are crafted from high-quality alloy metal, ensuring long-lasting durability and resistance to damage. Whether you're using them for brooch pins, boutonniere pins, or badge pins, their robust construction guarantees secure attachment and peace of mind.

Featuring multiple holes, these pin backings are designed for versatility. Perfect for brooch pins for crafts, magnetic pin backs, and name badges, they can be easily glued to connected crafts or sewn directly through the holes, accommodating various DIY projects with ease.

Each locking pin back is equipped with a reliable hook fastening system. Simply push the pin behind the catch to lock it securely in place, preventing accidental openings and ensuring your brooch pins and other accessories stay firmly attached throughout the day.

These pin backs are perfect for a wide range of creative applications. Whether you're making corsages, sewing fabric, or jewel crafting, their versatile design allows them to be affixed to most surfaces, making them a valuable addition to any crafter's toolkit.

The package includes 30 pcs pin backs locking in assorted sizes (20mm:10pcs, 25mm:10pcs, 30mm:5pcs, and 35mm:5pcs), providing ample options for various projects. From brooch pins to badge pins and beyond, this assortment ensures you have the right size pin back for any application.
